250315_Butler Democracy Protest_CAL9773..caption: Despite ongoing political tensions, protests persist even in the most conservative regions, including Butler, Pennsylvania. Roughly 150 residents gathered across from the government building to voice their disapproval of recent decisions by Trump and Elon Musk, particularly the dismissal of federal employees affiliated with the Veterans Affairs office.
250315_Butler Democracy Protest_CAL9773..description: Democracy protest in Butler, PA - a town marked by political history yet still hosting voices of dissent.

250417 The Rooney Rule_CAL3148.jpg.caption: At Pittsburgh's Playhouse, Jim Rooney, scholar N. Jeremi Duru, and Andrew Conte dissect the NFL's Rooney Rule, a policy born in this city that still sparks debate nationwide. The discussion highlighted both progress made and challenges remaining in sports diversity.
250417 The Rooney Rule_CAL3148.jpg.description: Panel discussion on the Rooney Rule's impact on NFL diversity and hiring practices.
250417 The Rooney Rule_CAL3148.jpg.publication: Point Park Center for Media Innovation
